00010         class Tag extends ActiveRecord
00011         {
00018                 public static function cloud($js_fn = NULL)
00019                 {
00020                         $factory = new self();
00021                         $tags = $factory->find_all();
00022                         return self::join($tags, TRUE, $js_fn);
00023                 }
00024                 
00034                 public static function join($tags, $hyperlinks = FALSE, $js_fn = NULL)
00035                 {
00036                         if (is_array($tags))
00037                         {
00038                                 $fn = $hyperlinks ?
00039                                         create_function('$t', "return a(\$t->tag, array('class' => 'token', 'href' => '#', 'onclick' => '" . addslashes($js_fn) . "'));") :
00040                                         create_function('$t', 'return $t->tag;');
00041                                 $tags = array_map($fn, $tags);
00042                                 $tags = implode(', ', $tags);
00043                         }
00044                         return $tags;
00045                 }
00046         }
